info.name: Darkwing
info.description: This is a theme to be used on Reddit's Robin Chat, an April Fools day gag. It is meant to be used along with the Parrot Greasemonkey/Tampermonkey script: https://github.com/5a1t/parrot
info.additionalInfo:
Darkwing v1.0

You should use this with the Parrot Greasemonkey/Tampermonkey script: https://github.com/5a1t/parrot
